translation.en: - Mommy, I'm sleepy. - Shh, shh.
Shh, shh. Let's go.
Daddy.
Shoop.
We're gonna do Shoop later.
- Shoop. - Shh, shh.
What are you doing?
- - Hey, what are you doing?
Hey, wait!
Ten on 2, please.
Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.es: Deja un mensaje, o no. Como quieras.

translation.en: Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.es: Deja un mensaje, o no. Como quieras.

translation.en: I'm gonna find us some place to sleep. I'll be right back.
translation.es: Encontraré un lugar para dormir. Ya vuelvo.

translation.en: - Alex? - Thank God you're here.
translation.es: - ¿Alex? - Gracias a Dios que estás aquí.

translation.en: I'm sorry to barge in like this. I called you, you didn't pick up.
translation.es: Perdón por venir sin avisar. Te llamé pero no atendiste.

translation.en: - I didn't know where else to go. - What's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.es: - No sabía a dónde ir. - ¿Qué pasa? ¿Estás bien?

translation.en: It's not Maddy, is it?
No, Maddy and I just need a place to crash for tonight.
translation.es: Maddy y yo necesitamos un lugar para dormir hoy.

translation.en: Can I crash here until I figure out what I'm doing?
God, of course. Get in here.
- Are the guys from the Swan here? - Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Los tipos del Swan están aquí? - Sí.

translation.en: Thought I heard your voice. Come inside. We got some sick dank from Humboldt.
translation.es: Creí oír tu voz. Entra. Tenemos una hierba potente de Humboldt.

translation.en: - Gotta get it. - Do it.
- Yeah. - All right. Pass it. Chill.
Hey.
- Next time. - Come on. He's already on his way over.
translation.es: - La próxima. - Alex, ya él viene para acá.

translation.en: He knows he drank too much. Hear him out. He wants to talk.
translation.es: Sabe que bebió demasiado. Escúchalo. Quiere hablar.

translation.en: - Don't be a bitch. - Ethan!
- Sorry-- - I'm good. I'm all right.
It's okay.
- Do you have some place to go? - I'm good.
Shoop.
- - Mm- mm.
Shoop is asleep, Maddy.
Shoop.
Can you try to close your eyes?
Shoop.
Okay, I know you want Shoop.
I know you want Shoop.
Mommy wants to ask the last owner if he jammed any other mixtape in here.
translation.es: Mami quiere saber quién atascó otro casete aquí.

translation.en: - Hey, there we go. There we go. -
Mommy.
That's okay. We're gonna freestyle it. That's what we're gonna do.
translation.es: No pasa nada. Vamos a improvisar. Haremos eso.

translation.en: You're packed and you're stacked 'Specially in the back
translation.es: Estás bien equipada Sobre todo atrás

translation.en: Brother, wanna thank your mother For a butt like that
translation.es: Vaya, quiero agradecer a tu madre Por ese trasero

translation.en: Can I get some fries With that shake- shake booty
translation.es: ¿Me darías unas papas fritas Con esos pechos?

translation.en: If looks could kill...
Gotta move, ma'am. You can't sleep here.
translation.es: Tiene que irse, señora. No puede dormir aquí.

translation.en: Ma'am.
You can't sleep here.
- Isn't this public property? - You can't park here.
translation.es: - ¿No es un espacio público? - No puede estacionar aquí.

translation.en: Got nowhere to be, go to a Walmart parking lot or to social services.
translation.es: Vaya al estacionamiento de Walmart o a Servicios Sociales.

translation.en: Okay.
Now.
Okay.
Russell.
That's us. Let's get it.
- Russell? - Russell, coming.
So you're looking for a big, fat government handout
because you are a jobless, white trash, piece of shit, am I right?
translation.es: porque eres una blanca ignorante y desempleada de mierda, ¿cierto?

translation.en: What?
Your form? You're gonna give that to me.
Yes.
All right. The child in your lap is Maddy.
translation.es: Bien. La niña en tu regazo es Maddy.

translation.en: - And Schmariel. - What?
Uh, it's the Ariel that we got from a dollar store.
translation.es: Es una Ariel de la tienda de todo por un dólar.

translation.en: So we call her Schmariel.
- Are you the child's legal guardian? - Yes.
Can you prove that?
Uh, I can show you my stretch marks.
Are you under the influence of any drugs or alcohol?
translation.es: ¿Estás bajo los efectos del alcohol o de alguna droga?

translation.en: No.
Are you sure?
Because you look strung out.
No.
We slept in a car last night.
translation.es: Anoche dormimos en un auto, es eso.

translation.en: So you're homeless?
No. No, I wouldn't say that.
So you have a home?
I had a home and then we left it.
translation.es: Tenía casa y luego nos fuimos de ahí.

translation.en: Maddy's dad is, um-- He drinks and, uh...
translation.es: El papá de Maddy es... Él bebe y...

translation.en: He blacks out and punches stuff.
translation.es: Pierde el conocimiento y golpea cosas.

translation.en: Is this some kind of fucking fairy tale, Alex?
translation.es: ¿Esto es una especie de cuento de hadas, Alex?

translation.en: - Punches you? - No.
- Punches Maddy? - No. No.
Just...
Last night, um...
Last night was different and I got scared.
translation.es: Anoche fue distinto y me dio miedo.

translation.en: Did you file a police report?
No.
Do you wanna call the cops now? It's not too late.
translation.es: ¿Quieres llamar a la Policía? Aún no es tarde.

translation.en: And say what? That he didn't hit me?
translation.es: ¿Y qué les digo? ¿Que no me golpeó?

translation.en: There's shelters for domestic violence victims,
translation.es: Hay albergues para víctimas de violencia doméstica,

translation.en: but you need to go on record with your abuse.
translation.es: pero tienes que denunciar el abuso.

translation.en: I'm not abused.
Okay, hon.
So according to you, you're not abused and you're not homeless.
translation.es: Por lo que dices, no fuiste abusada ni vives en la calle.

translation.en: Why are you here?
We don't have anywhere to sleep tonight.
What about mom? It says here she's local.
translation.es: ¿Y tu mamá? Veo que vive por aquí.

translation.en: I would rather sleep in my car.
Dad?
My family is not an option.
translation.es: Mi familia no es una opción.

translation.en: Are you currently employed?
- Nope. - You went to six different high schools?
Yeah, my mom moved around a lot and then eventually I got my GED in 2016.
translation.es: Sí, mi mamá se mudaba mucho. Terminé la secundaria en el 2016.

translation.en: Any college, technical schools?
translation.es: ¿Fuiste a la universidad o a alguna escuela técnica?

translation.en: I got into college...
um, but I didn't go.
Is there anything that you can give me?
translation.es: ¿Me dirás algo que pueda poner aquí?

translation.en: Any special skills?
On your mark, get set, go!
No.
All right. Here's the deal.
I need two pay stubs in order to get you on the list for subsidized housing,
translation.es: Para entrar en la lista de viviendas sociales necesito dos recibos de sueldo

translation.en: and even then, the wait list is long.
translation.es: y aun así, la lista de espera es larga.

translation.en: In the meantime, there's a mission over at St. Carmel's and they have beds open.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, hay un albergue en St. Carmel con camas disponibles.

translation.en: I can't take Maddy there.
translation.es: No puedo llevar a Maddy ahí.

translation.en: Sure you can.
Get there early. Wear Deet.
Um, I'm sorry. Is there anything else that you could do for us here?
translation.es: Disculpe, ¿no puede hacer nada más por nosotras?

translation.en: Honestly, without a job,
translation.es: La verdad, si no tienes trabajo,

translation.en: I can't do squat.
Okay. Um...
I can't get a job if I can't afford day care.
translation.es: No puedo trabajar si no puedo pagar una guardería.

translation.en: Well, we have access to subsidized day care grants once you have a job.
translation.es: Bueno, si consigues trabajo, podrían darte un subsidio para la guardería.

translation.en: I need a job to prove that I need day care in order to get a job?
translation.es: ¿Debo tener un trabajo para probar que necesito guardería y tener un trabajo?

translation.en: What kind of fuckery is that?
You know what?
Why don't you try this?
Value Maids?
It's a local cleaning service, lot of turnover. Worth a shot.
translation.es: Es una empresa de limpieza, siempre buscan gente. Inténtalo.

translation.en: I'll call them to tell them you're on your way.
translation.es: Llamaré para avisar que vas para allá.

translation.en: - Great. Yeah. Thank you. - Yeah?
Can I bring Maddy?
To a job interview?
Mom!
Is Paula here?
Paula Langley?
I don't know who Paula is. We Airbnb'd this place from Basil.
translation.es: No sé quién es Paula. Le alquilamos la casa a Basil.

translation.en: - Hi, Mom. -
Maddy, Alex!
This is so exciting.
I can't believe you came to see this.
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayan venido a ver esto.

translation.en: This is what all the brilliant painters and sculptors are doing in the art world.
translation.es: Es lo que están haciendo todos los pintores y escultores brillantes.

translation.en: This is me stepping up to a global collective of minds.
translation.es: Así me uno a un inconsciente colectivo mundial.

translation.en: - Hey, Mom. - Archetypes. You know about it.
That's what I'm representing here in cobalt.
translation.es: Es lo que estoy representando en cobalto.

translation.en: The hero, the every man, mentor, the mystic - the lover. - Mom.
translation.es: - El héroe, el hombre común, el mentor. - Mamá.

translation.en: And there's Jungian archetypes.
Why didn't you tell me that you Airbnb'd your house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste que alquilaste tu casa?

translation.en: I did, didn't I?
I drove around two campgrounds looking for you.
If you don't check- in with me, that's on you.
translation.es: Si no me llamas, es cosa tuya.

translation.en: I called you 14 times.
Is that Alexandra? Bloody hell.
You disturbed the Airbnb people?
They're gonna leave a shit review now, you fair dinkum monster.
translation.es: Van a dejar una reseña de mierda, grandísimo monstruo.

translation.en: I can't deal with him and his fake Australian accent.
translation.es: No lo tolero ni a él ni a su falso acento.

translation.en: It's not fake. I was born in Perth, so...
translation.es: No es falso. Nací en Perth, así que...

translation.en: - I'm sure you were, Cilantro. - Don't call Basil Cilantro, Alex.
translation.es: - Sí, seguro, Cilantro. - No molestes a Basil, Alex.

translation.en: Our identity is subjective.
He's Australian, I'm French- Italian.
In reality, we're both 100 percent Icelandic fairy.
translation.es: En verdad, los dos somos 100 % hadas islandesas.

translation.en: Can I talk to you in private? I'm in a rush, Mom.
No. Whatever you can say to me, you can say in front of him.
translation.es: No, puedes decirme lo que sea frente a él.

translation.en: Because he is my life and business partner.
translation.es: Porque él es mi compañero de vida y de negocios.

translation.en: What business?
Renting your house out, or making you sleep in an RV?
translation.es: ¿Alquilar tu casa o hacerte dormir en una caravana?

translation.en: You're a malignant tumor.
- Go put some shrimp on the barbie. - All right. Enough.
translation.es: - Ve a acariciar un koala. - Bien. Ya basta.

translation.en: Out with it.
- With-- ? Um... - Out with it.
You want something from me, so just ask. What is it?
Can you watch Maddy? I have a job interview. One hour, two max.
translation.es: ¿Puedes cuidar a Maddy? Tengo una entrevista de trabajo.

translation.en: Of course. She's my granddaughter.
She is always welcome to experience me and be a part of my life.
translation.es: Siempre es bienvenida para experimentarme y ser parte de mi vida.

translation.en: Do you remember the rules? Use your phone.
Use your phone and answer the phone. Okay, Mom?
- Nod that you hear me. - Nod.
Don't drive her anywhere. Do you have food here? Can you give her lunch?
translation.es: Y no la lleves en auto. ¿Tienes comida? ¿Puedes darle de comer?

translation.en: - We're a pub now, are we? - Anything goes wrong, call me.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora somos un bar? - Si pasa algo, llámame.

translation.en: Don't call Sean. Call me.
translation.es: No llames a Sean. A mí.

translation.en: Come on, pumpky- poo.
Be a good girl for Grammy and Cilantro. Love you.
translation.es: Pórtate bien con la abuela y Cilantro. Te amo.

translation.en: Bye, Mom!
I love you!
Put some eyes on her.
Hi, I'm looking for Value Maids?
Sorry, the address says it's here.
Thank you.
Yeah?
Hi, are you Yolanda?
If this is another summons, shove it up your ass.
translation.es: Si es otra citación, puedes metértela en el culo.

translation.en: No, I'm Alex. Jody sent me.
translation.es: No, soy Alex. Me envió Jody.

translation.en: Oh, one of Jody's girls.
translation.es: Ah, eres una de las chicas de Jody.

translation.en: Poor thing. Not you. Jody. Being a social worker sucks.
translation.es: Pobrecita. Tú no. Jody. Es malísimo ser asistente social.

translation.en: So you're on parole?
Um, no.
- Got any priors? - No.
I'll check. Got a problem with a background check?
- No. - We pay that, no exceptions.
Bump you up 50 cents once the background check clears and you go full- time.
translation.es: Y 50 centavos más si no tienes antecedentes y trabajas tiempo completo.

translation.en: Full- time, great.
Yes, but full- time ain't a 40- hour week.
translation.es: Sí, pero no son 40 horas a la semana.

translation.en: Company policy is you can't work more than six hours a day.
translation.es: No puedes trabajar más de seis horas al día.

translation.en: More than six hours, bitches start throwing their backs out,
translation.es: Si trabajas más horas, te lesionas la espalda,

translation.en: which breaks my heart, it does, but I can't be paying benefits.
translation.es: eso me rompe el corazón, pero no puedo pagar beneficios.

translation.en: So it's capped. Six hours a day, max.
translation.es: Bien, seis horas al día máximo.

translation.en: Okay.
And tourist season's over, so I really only have one shift open.
translation.es: Y la temporada turística terminó, solo me queda un turno disponible.

translation.en: It's a weekly three- hour clean over on Fisher Island.
translation.es: Es un trabajo semanal de tres horas en Fisher Island.

translation.en: One shift. Okay.
So uniform is 25 bucks. Comes out of your first check.
translation.es: El uniforme cuesta $25. Se descuenta de tu primer pago.

translation.en: How soon do you think I could get proof of employment? A pay stub.
translation.es: ¿Cuándo podría conseguir un certificado de trabajo?

translation.en: Cart before the horse. This is a trial.
translation.es: No te adelantes. Estás a prueba.

translation.en: You ain't hired yet.
- You got a car? - Yes.
We provide a ferry pass.
translation.es: Te damos un pase para el ferry.

translation.en: But gas and toll, that's on you.
translation.es: Tú pagas el combustible y los peajes.

translation.en: So are cleaning supplies, rags, gloves,
translation.es: También los elementos de limpieza, paños, guantes,

translation.en: basically everything else except the Dyson.
If you don't return the Dyson to me directly after the shift,
translation.es: Si no me la devuelves después de tu turno,

translation.en: - you don't get paid. Understand? - Yes, I do.
All right. Can you do there at 1:00? Let me get you the sheet.
Oh, so I'm starting today?
That's good news, ain't it, broke girl?
Great.
- Hello. - Hey, Mom. How's it going?
She's a very powerful archetype.
translation.es: Ella es un arquetipo muy poderoso.

translation.en: A love child. That's what she is, her spirit resounds.
translation.es: Es fruto del amor. Eso es lo que es, su espíritu resuena.

translation.en: - Did you feed her? - The spirit of my mother is in her.
translation.es: - ¿Comió? - El espíritu de mi madre está en ella.

translation.en: She is a very powerful young lady. Our ancestry pulses through her blood.
translation.es: Es una jovencita muy poderosa. Nuestro linaje corre por sus venas.

translation.en: Sure does. Did you end up giving her lunch, though?
Of course. Grilled cheese and tomato with a side of straight Tom Collins
translation.es: Por supuesto. Un sándwich tostado de tomate y queso y un Tom Collins,

translation.en: and now we are painting.
- Aren't we, sweetie? We're painting. - Awesome.
Hey. So listen. I got hired and I'm starting right now.
translation.es: Escucha, me contrataron, y tengo que empezar ya mismo.

translation.en: You should see what she's doing. And her hands, they're like sculptures.
translation.es: Deberías ver lo que hace. Y sus manos, son como esculturas.

translation.en: - Listen, I'm starting right now. - Oh, honey. It's just so pretty.
translation.es: - Escucha, empiezo a trabajar ahora. - Cariño. Es tan linda.

translation.en: - Her painting. - It's a three- hour clean on Fisher Island.
translation.es: - Su pintura. - Un trabajo de 3 horas en Fisher Island.

translation.en: You should see her hands! Look at her hands!
I'll be back at the ferry at 4:05 and I'll be at yours at 5:30. Does that work?
translation.es: Volveré en el ferry de las 4:05 y estaré en tu casa a las 5:30. ¿Está bien?

translation.en: Don't we, sweetie?
No phones. You're a half hour late.
translation.es: Nada de teléfonos. Llegas media hora tarde.

translation.en: - I'm sorry. I'm-- - A half hour late.
translation.es: - Lo siento. Yo... - Media hora tarde.

translation.en: I know. I didn't have any signal and missed my turn. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Lo sé. No tenía señal y se me hizo tarde. Lo siento.

translation.en: We'll reschedule.
I can be done by 4:00, ma'am. I'm fast and I'm good.
translation.es: Puedo terminar a las 4:00, señora. Soy rápida y buena.

translation.en: I'd really rather you come back another time
than do a shoddy job and throw a bunch of cleaning products around.
translation.es: y no que limpies mal y desperdicies productos de limpieza.

translation.en: I understand. I won't disappoint you.
We're in NYC this weekend. Everything in the fridge can go
translation.es: No estaremos el fin de semana. Vacía el refrigerador

translation.en: so my whole house doesn't smell like kombucha when I get back. Got it?
translation.es: para que cuando vuelva, mi casa no huela a kombucha. ¿Sí?

translation.en: The fridge. I got it.
We compost. The bin is labeled compost. Can you read or should I show you?
translation.es: Compostamos. El cubo dice compost. ¿Sabes leer o te lo muestro?

translation.en: I can read.
Oh, God. Just put them on. I'll talk to her.
Tell them those terms are bullshit.
translation.es: Diles que esas condiciones son una mierda.

translation.en: Okay.
Tick- tock. Should have rescheduled.
Mommy.
It's a tiara.
Mommy, are you okay?
- Are you okay? - Are you okay, Mommy?
Are you okay?
Hey.
Why are you on the floor?
Oh, what happened?
I heard a thunk. I think you fainted.
translation.es: Oí un golpe. Creo que te desmayaste.

translation.en: Or are you a drug addict?
Uh, no. Um...
I'm so sorry. I skipped breakfast this morning. I'm fine.
translation.es: Lo siento. Hoy no desayuné. Estoy bien.

translation.en: Okay, well, just hold on. Don't get up fast.
translation.es: Bien, espera. No te levantes rápido.

translation.en: Fuck.
Okay.
Balance bar.
Thank you.
This room is so nice.
Gosh, I've got a daughter and she would love this. How old is your kid?
translation.es: A mi hija le encantaría. ¿Cuántos años tiene tu hijo?

translation.en: I don't have children.
Isn't this a nursery?
Yeah, it's staged.
We're getting ready to sell the house. So, uh... James had it staged.
translation.es: Vamos a vender la casa, así que James hizo que la decoraran así.

translation.en: Well...
Not to be a task master, but...
Obviously. Of course. I'm almost done too.
translation.es: Seguro. Por supuesto. Ya casi termino.

translation.en: I just have this room left and...
translation.es: Solo me queda esta habitación y...

translation.en: This room and all the lawn furniture.
Shit.
Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.es: Su llamada ha sido enviada al buzón de voz.

translation.en: Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.es: Su llamada ha sido enviada al buzón de voz.

translation.en: Maddy?
Maddy, are you in here? Maddy?
Mom, can't you hear me calling? What the fuck?
Calling me? It was me that was calling you many, many times.
translation.es: ¿Me llamaste? Yo te llamé muchas veces.

translation.en: - Okay. Where is Maddy? - I have a life of my own, you know?
I can't be watching children all day. I have work to do. My own work, okay?
translation.es: No puedo cuidar niños todo el día. Tengo que trabajar. En mis cosas. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Basil, are you in here? Open the door!
I bet you'd like to get in there with him. I see how you act around him.
translation.es: Te gustaría estar ahí con él. Veo cómo actúas cuando él está presente.

translation.en: Always flirting with him, sticking your little titties out.
translation.es: Le coqueteas, le muestras las tetitas.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? Where is Maddy?
- I'm taking a nap. Jesus. - Why can't you be happy for me?
translation.es: - Estaba durmiendo. - ¿Por qué no puedes alegrarte por mí?

translation.en: She's not here.
That I can still attract a quality man like him.
translation.es: De que aún puedo atraer a un hombre como él.

translation.en: - Okay, where is she? - We couldn't reach you
and your mom got tired, so we called Sean to get her.
translation.es: y tu mamá se cansó, así que llamamos a Sean.

translation.en: You have never seen my potential. I am soaring on the cliff.
translation.es: Nunca viste mi potencial. Estoy planeando en el precipicio.

translation.en: The sun beams towards me. It fills me with light!
translation.es: Los rayos del sol me iluminan. ¡Me llenan de luz!

translation.en: She's fine. She's all right. She's asleep.
We did bath time.
She had buttered noodles.
You hungry?
Dinner's almost ready.
Irish stew.
Fuck!
I haven't had a drink today. Come on.
Alex.
I'm trying here.
Hey.
I'm not staying for dinner. I'm getting Maddy and I'm leaving.
translation.es: No me quedaré a cenar. Buscaré a Maddy y me voy.

translation.en: I went to a meeting today.
Ethan took me.
Okay. That's...
Could you please sit?
- All right. Let's make a fucking mess! -
Fuck!
You need to eat.
Come on.
I'm surprised Maddy was at your mom's.
translation.es: Me sorprendió que Maddy estuviera con tu mamá.

translation.en: Is Paula finally on meds, or...?
She was only supposed to be there a couple of hours.
translation.es: Solo iba a estar ahí un par de horas.

translation.en: You know how much I love Paula.
I do, but... leaving Maddy with her?
translation.es: En serio. Pero... ¿dejar a Maddy con ella?

translation.en: I thought we had an agreement.
translation.es: Creí que habíamos llegado a un acuerdo.

translation.en: My mom's good with her for short periods of time.
translation.es: Ella es buena con Maddy si la cuida poco tiempo.

translation.en: They, um... dance around or do art projects.
translation.es: Ellas... bailan o hacen proyectos artísticos.

translation.en: She was alone when I got there.
Playing with a vape and watching a cage match on TV.
translation.es: Jugando con un cigarrillo electrónico y mirando peleas en la televisión.

translation.en: Where were you? Nobody could find you.
I got a job on Fisher Island, and I didn't have service.
translation.es: Conseguí un trabajo en Fisher Island y no tenía señal.

translation.en: A job?
How are you gonna work? Who's gonna watch Maddy?
translation.es: ¿Cómo harás para trabajar? ¿Quién cuidará a Maddy?

translation.en: Not your mom.
I'll figure it out. It's my business, Sean, okay?
translation.es: Ya veré. Es asunto mío, Sean. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Could you eat a little?
You're hurting my feelings.
I'm not eating your fucking stew, okay?
Stop asking.
All right.
You're officially freaking me out.
Going AWOL in the middle of the night?
Leaving my child in a dangerous situation with a batshit crazy person?
translation.es: ¿Dejas a mi hija en una situación peligrosa con una loca de atar?

translation.en: I mean, are you feeling okay?
- That's not funny. Don't do that. - What?
translation.es: - No es gracioso. No hagas eso. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: I'm not insane. You're the one that woke me up in a rage
translation.es: No estoy loca, Sean. Tú me despertaste enfurecido

translation.en: over some dirty dishes and punched a hole in the wall.
translation.es: por unos platos sucios y golpeaste la pared.

translation.en: I drank too much. I went too far.
I went too far, I'm sorry.
I picked glass out of Maddy's hair last night.
translation.es: Anoche saqué vidrios del cabello de Maddy.

translation.en: I didn't mean for it to be that close to her.
translation.es: No fue mi intención estar tan cerca de ella.

translation.en: Hey, I would never hurt her, you know that.
translation.es: Oye, nunca la lastimaría. Lo sabes.

translation.en: I don't know that.
You serious right now?
Okay, what's the plan here?
Where are you gonna go? Hmm?
I pay all the bills.
Let you hang out with my friends,
translation.es: Te dejo pasar el rato con mis amigos,

translation.en: I let you move into my trailer, you drink my beer, eat my food.
translation.es: te dejé mudarte a mi caravana, bebes mi cerveza, comes mi comida.

translation.en: I let you mooch off me.
translation.es: Te dejo vivir a costillas mías.

translation.en: I do everything for you.
If you walk out of here, you'll have no one.
translation.es: Si te vas de aquí, no tendrás a nadie.

translation.en: I know. I'm well aware of how completely alone and fucked I am.
translation.es: Lo sé. Sé muy bien lo sola y jodida que estoy.

translation.en: But I won't pick glass out of Maddy's hair again. Not gonna happen.
translation.es: Pero no volveré a sacar vidrios del cabello de Maddy.

translation.en: Hey, where are you going?
- Hey. Hey, Maddy, sweetie. - Daddy.
Daddy's right here, okay?
Where are you going, Alex?
What's the plan here?
Okay, why don't you think for just one second?
Would you please look at me? Alex?
Why don't you come back inside?
- We can talk about this. - There you go, honey. It's okay.
Where are you gonna go?
Hey, you can't steal my kid!
Sweetie, Daddy's right here, okay? Where are you gonna go?
translation.es: Cariño, papi está aquí, ¿sí? Alex, ¿a dónde irás?

translation.en: Hey! Alex!
Alex!
Shoop.
Shoop, Mommy.
- Where are we going? - I don't know. I need a second, all right?
translation.es: - ¿A dónde vamos, mami? - No lo sé. Necesito un momento.

translation.en: - Home. - We can't go home right now, okay?
translation.es: - A casa. - No podemos ir a casa, ¿sí?

translation.en: Look, Mommy, look.
I'm gonna take this real quick.
Yolanda, the Dyson, I know.
- Regina's not happy with your cleaning. - What?
translation.es: - Regina no está contenta con tu trabajo. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: She called and said you did a crap job on the furniture, left streaks.
translation.es: Dijo que limpiaste mal los muebles, dejaste manchas.

translation.en: - Go back, and do it right. - Window, Mommy!
- Yes, honey. - Mommy.
Okay, okay, hold on. I'm gonna...
Nope, I can't. I'm in Port Hampstead, and I have my daughter with me.
translation.es: No puedo. Estoy en Port Hampstead y estoy con mi hija.

translation.en: Not my problem. You want this job? You wanna get paid? Go back.
translation.es: No es problema mío. ¿Quieres el trabajo? ¿Quieres que te pague? Regresa.

translation.en: - It's a 45- minute ferry each way. - Then you better get cracking.
translation.es: - Son 45 minutos en ferry. - Entonces mejor apúrate.

translation.en: You're flying.
- Hold on, all right? - Look, Mommy.
We don't have time for this, Maddy.
translation.es: No tenemos tiempo para esto, Maddy.

translation.en: Schmariel!
We'll go back and get Schmariel. We're gonna get Schmariel later.
translation.es: Volveremos a buscar a Schmariel. La buscaremos luego.

translation.en: - I'm getting Schmariel now. - Schmariel!
I'm getting her right now. Okay. All right.
Okay.
Are you okay?
You okay? You okay?
You're okay. You're okay.
Jesus Christ! She was in there?
Yes, my daughter was fucking in the car! She was in there, you fucking moron!
translation.es: Sí, mi hija estaba adentro. Ella estaba adentro, maldito idiota.

translation.en: You hit my fucking car. You could have killed my daughter.
translation.es: Me chocaste el puto auto. Podrías haber matado a mi hija.

translation.en: Get the fuck away from me!
We live in here, you dipshit!
Oh, you're so good.
And then shine the light.
Yeah.
Here you go, ma'am.
- You're giving me a ticket? - Parking in the meridian is illegal.
translation.es: - ¿Esto es una multa? - Es ilegal estacionar en el arcén.

translation.en: I can't pay for this.
If you have any personal items you'd like to retrieve from the car
translation.es: Si tiene objetos personales que quiera sacar del auto

translation.en: before the tow truck gets here, now is your time.
translation.es: antes de que llegue la grúa, hágalo ahora.

translation.en: And who pays for the tow truck?
You have someone who can pick you up?
If you don't have anybody to call, we can drop you at home.
translation.es: Si no tiene a quien llamar, podemos dejarla en su casa.

translation.en: Um, no, no, no. I've got-- I've got somebody. Thank you so much.
translation.es: No, no. Yo... tengo a alguien. Gracias.

translation.en: Can you make the call now? I gotta clear the meridian.
translation.es: ¿Puede hacer la llamada? Tengo que despejar el arcén.

translation.en: - You can't stay here. All right. - Got it.
translation.es: - No puede quedarse aquí. Bien. - Entiendo.

translation.en: Were you speeding at the time?
Hey.
She's out like a light.
Last time I saw her, she was still in diapers.
translation.es: La última vez que la vi, todavía usaba pañales.

translation.en: I would like to see her more than I get to.
So where to? Port Hampstead?
Sean still in that single- wide?
translation.es: ¿Sean sigue viviendo en la misma caravana?

translation.en: No, we're, um...
We're not gonna go home.
Oh. Okay.
Where to, then?
I mean, I'd invite you back to my house...
but it's a school night, and Charlene and the kids--
translation.es: pero es día de semana, y Charlene y los niños...

translation.en: No, yeah. Of course.
Maybe, um...
Would you mind just dropping us at the ferry station?
translation.es: ¿Podrías dejarnos en la estación del ferry?

translation.en: I'll have my friend pick us up.
What were you thinking pulled over like that?
It's just that's... a reckless thing to do.
Reminds me of your mother.
Can we just not talk?
Okay.
Would you mind pulling over real quick and let me run to the dollar store?
translation.es: ¿Podríamos detenernos en la tienda de todo por un dólar?

translation.en: Thanks.
Let's put you down. There you go.
You, uh... You need anything else
from your old pop?
We're all set, thanks again.
Bye- bye, honey bee.
Boat.
No, not tonight. We're just gonna get a little rest in.
translation.es: No, esta noche no. Solo vamos a descansar.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Come here, baby girl.
- This was in my shoe. - What's in your shoe?
translation.es: - Esto estaba en mi zapato. - ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: - This was in my shoe. - What the heck?
translation.es: - Esto estaba en mi zapato. - ¿Qué diablos?

translation.en: What the heck?
Okay.
I put it in my shoe.
You're fixing my earrings, all right?
How do we unclip this?
Well...
Okey- dokey. I got you a surprise. You wanna see a surprise?
translation.es: Listo. Te tengo una sorpresa. ¿Quieres ver la sorpresa?

translation.en: Okay.
Ta- da!
We got Schmariel.
All better.
Announcing the arrival of Ferry 41.
Ferry 41 arriving.
